column5: Ricoh WG-M2 Action Camera Anyone heard of this one or have feedback? It's an airmiles offer and am considering getting it if it is good quality. Thanks

interesting I did not know them, so googled specs and videos from owners not someone trying to sell  them I am impressed . video and sound looks better then gopro I saw them on amazon.ca for 250.00 to  310.10 CND if I needed another action camera I would buy one but this is an opinion after 15 minutes of research

Try this link for a comparison of action cameras  https://www.dpreview.com/reviews/2016-roundup-4k-action-cameras  I have an older GoPro and am very happy with the video quality. Not as good in low light but I think the newer ones have improved.  Jon
Thanks, reviews are good and for what I would use it for it seems like it would be sufficient. I think I'll give it a go.
